pr_title: Uses prepared statements for all Cassandra Queries

timeline.bodyText: I noticed we never used references for the main table! This allows reference search when you are trying to figure out impact of a table. Using text is less precise as the word "traces" is too common
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
codefromthecrypt

timeline.message:
Uses prepared statements for all Cassandra Queries

In #3156, we stopped using prepared statements for simple queries for
reasons including a bug in logging, which is now fixed. This restores
use of prepared statements for all Cassandra queries and backfills
rationale of why this helps.
